title: No Title
description: 4.5/5 What do you like best about Zoom Workplace? Recently there have been a lot of new AI additions to the app seeking enhancements in the userworkflow. Some new AI tools like the Zoom Docs along with the new scheduler and whiteboard features have helped us to improve the productivity of our meetings to some extent. Also the simultaneous multi screen share support has been a great addition. Overall the app still remains to be our daily meeting driver. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com. What do you dislike about Zoom Workplace? Even though Zoom Workplace has evolved a lot in the last few years there are still few things that need attention. The free plan is still limited. The new AI Tools like the Zoom Docs which I used aim to provide great features and functionality but still are not that optimised or mature we can say. Also the new AI additions are a little confusing when you try implementing them in your workflow for the first time. Also the meeting UI needs a new look after years of similar looking meeting UI. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com. What problems is Zoom Workplace solving and how is that benefiting you? Zoom has made it possible to contact our colleagues and business partners at any remote corner of the world. The possible inetgrations with different calendars and business apps makes meeting scheduling and reminders an easy task. Review collected by and hosted on G2.com. Show More

title: No Title
description: 4.5/5 What do you like best about Zoom Workplace? Recently there have been a lot of new AI additions to the app seeking enhancements in the userworkflow. Some new AI tools like the Zoom Docs along with the new scheduler and whiteboard features have helped us to improve the productivity of our meetings to some extent. What do you dislike about Zoom Workplace? Even though Zoom Workplace has evolved a lot in the last few years there are still few things that need attention. The free plan is still limited.
